name: Interview With the Artists of Tomorrow -  Photography NFT Collection

metadata.name: Interview With the Artists of Tomorrow - Adam Kostandy
metadata.description:
Adam Kostandy is a cinematographer, filmmaker, and coder. 

Here is a photo of Adam Kostandy during one of our rehearsals for the film, "The Keys." Adam Is the only cinematographer I've worked with on any of my movies. Working with Adam has always been a blessing. Adam can quickly adapt and fix issues, saving me multiple times on set. Over the years, I felt like working with Adam was like taking a crash course on cinematography. I've learned a lot from him.

We don't see or talk to each other unless we're working on a project together, but strangely I have an unusual amount of trust in him. It's just one of those relationships that you appreciate. There have been opportunities where I could have worked with a different cinematographer for my films, but I always stuck with Adam. The idea of potentially working with another cinematographer upsets me.
